bibl.title: The Wages of Effeminacy?: Kinaidoi in Greek Documents from Egypt.
bibl.note: [Introduction: an occupational term for some kind of performer.] - Payments made by kinaidoi. - Payments made to kinaidoi. - Correspondence and a petition concerning kinaidoi. - A hapax legomenon [in P. Dublin 14]. - A comparison with other sources. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Eugesta. Revue sur le genre dans l'Antiquité

bibl.seg: Tom Sapsford, The Wages of Effeminacy?: Kinaidoi in Greek Documents from Egypt.

[Introduction: an occupational term for some kind of performer.] - Payments made by kinaidoi. - Payments made to kinaidoi. - Correspondence and a petition concerning kinaidoi. - A hapax legomenon [in P. Dublin 14]. - A comparison with other sources. - Avec résumé en anglais.
